timeline.description: The Rising Sun alliance was founded by the first leader, ShadowFox.
The alliance won its first war against Zone 331, gaining recognition and rewards.
Vice Leader NightWolf was promoted to Acting Leader after ShadowFoxâ€™s departure.
Reached 100 active members for the first time.
Merged with 'Silver Blades' alliance from Server 335, gaining 20+ new veterans.
Updated alliance rules to reflect new activity and contribution expectations.
